SELECT
,sum(b.quantity) as sumquantity,sum(b.num) as sumnum,sum(b.money) as summoney FROM account_arrival a ,account_arrival_detail b WHERE a.id=b.parent_Id and a.del_flag='0'
and a.supplier like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{supplier}),'%')
and a.arrivalstatus = #{arrivalstatus}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.arrival_date) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${beginDate} 00:00:00')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.arrival_date) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${endDate} 23:59:59')
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.arrival_date DESC
;
